```{r echo=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
```

## Load the dataset
```{r echo=FALSE}
setwd('~/Dev/python/datascience/exploratoryR/project/')
wines <- read.csv('wineQualityWhites.csv', sep=',')
summary(wines)
str(wines)
```

## Quality of wines
```{r}
ggplot(aes(x = quality), data = wines) +
  geom_histogram()
```
